item.title: Lee Kum Kee presents its Asian Twist Dressings at the 2017 World Gourmet Summit
item.description:
May Lim, Managing Director of South East Asia, Middle East, Africa & India for Lee Kum Kee (right) and Chef John See (left) at the World Gourmet Summit Opening Reception. Source: Lee Kum Kee International Holdings. Famous for creating oyster sauce and its dedication to high quality for over 100 years, Lee Kum Kee, a globally recognized brand known for Chinese sauces and condiments, continues to sponsor the World Gourmet Summit 2017 (WGS) in Singapore...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/lee-kum-kee-presents-its-asian-twist-dressings-at-the-2017-world-gourmet-summit/
